definition: Kenya (Tw) (written as 肯尼亞|肯尼亚 in PRC)
to agree/to consent/to be ready (to do sth)/willing

sentences.english: Most visitors to Kenya come to see the animals.
sentences.chinese: 大多數的遊客來肯亞都是來看動物的。

sentences.english: Sporadic cases of chikungunya have been reported since mid-February.
sentences.chinese: 自2月中以來報告了基孔肯亞病的散在病例。

sentences.english: Damn those poor Kenyans. If only they weren't such pessimistic sourpusses.
sentences.chinese: 該死的肯亞窮人，你們別那麼怨天尤人就好了。

sentences.english: A vacation to Kenya is the perfect way to have a wild time.
sentences.chinese: 到肯亞度假是個享受野趣時光的好方法。

sentences.english: Want to track an elephant on the plains of Kenya?
sentences.chinese: 想要在肯亞的草原上追逐大象的蹤影嗎？

sentences.english: Clinton also will meet Kenyan President Mwai Kibaki and Prime Minister Raila Odinga.
sentences.chinese: 克林頓還將會晤肯亞總統齊貝吉和總理奧廷加。

sentences.english: The study showed that these measures helped fish populations grow in Kenya.
sentences.chinese: 研究顯示這些措施使得肯亞地區的魚數增長。

sentences.english: Dr. Achieng Oneko is the Managing Director of the Kenya Tourist Board.
sentences.chinese: 亞秦歐尼可博士是肯亞旅遊局的局長。

sentences.english: Hundreds of dead flamingos were found on the shores of two lakes in western Kenya.
sentences.chinese: 肯亞西部的兩座湖岸發現了數百隻已經死的紅鶴。

pinyin: Gang1 guo3 Min2 zhu3 Gong4 he2 guo2

definition: East Timor (officially Democratic Republic of Timor-Leste)
